Container.Name: immichFrame
Container.Overview:
immichFrame is a digital photo frame application that interfaces with your immich server.
This project is not affiliated with immich!
Container.Requires: This container requires an configuration to access your instance of immich. See here: https://github.com/immichFrame/ImmichFrame#settingsjson

Config.Name: immichFrame Config
Config.Description: immichFrame Config-Folder, should contain a Settings.json, more informations here: https://github.com/immichFrame/ImmichFrame#settingsjson
